title: Implement `integer, parameter :: x(*) = [1, 2, 3]`
body:
Example:
```fortran
program const_arrays
integer, parameter :: x(*) = [1, 2, 3]
print *, x
end
```
Currently one gets:
```console
$ lfortran arrays_01.f90 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/bin/lfortran.cpp", line 1794
    err = compile_to_object_file(arg_file, tmp_o, false,
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/bin/lfortran.cpp", line 774
    res = fe.get_llvm3(*asr, lpm, diagnostics);
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/lfortran/fortran_evaluator.cpp", line 321
    compiler_options, run_fn);
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/libasr/codegen/asr_to_llvm.cpp", line 6195
    v.nested_func_types = pass_find_nested_vars(asr, context,
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 4080
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 4057
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 4081
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 3836
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/libasr/codegen/asr_to_llvm.cpp", line 1157
    visit_symbol(*item.second);
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 4083

  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/libasr/codegen/asr_to_llvm.cpp", line 2160
    declare_vars(x);
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/libasr/codegen/asr_to_llvm.cpp", line 2505
    fill_array_details(ptr, llvm_data_type, m_dims, n_dims);
  File "/Users/ondrej/repos/lfortran/lfortran/src/libasr/codegen/asr_to_llvm.cpp", line 426
    visit_expr(*(m_dim.m_start));
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 4141
  File "../libasr/asr.h", line 4141
  Binary file "/usr/lib/system/libsystem_platform.dylib", local address: 0x1803244e3
Segfault: Signal SIGSEGV (segmentation fault) received
```

I don't think it's difficult to fix, we just need to get the compile time length of the RHS, and use that as the length of the LHS.
